course.title: Mobile Device Application Development
course.catalogDescription: This course focuses on developing applications for modern Smartphone operating systems. Most of the course is dedicated to some specific mobile device OS at the discretion of the instructor. Rapid application development techniques are covered, as well as setup of the development environment, real-world testing, and deployment.

objectives.objective: Get students familiar with the corresponding App development SDK.
Get students familiar with the MVC (Model-View-Control) architecture in mobile app development.
Get students familiar with the steps of building, testing and debugging, and deploying their mobile app with either virtual or real devices.
